channel.title: FLF - The Liberty Lounge with Tim Tysoe
channel.description: FIGHT LAUGH FEAST PRESENTS SHOWS PROCLAIMING THE LORDSHIP OF CHRIST OVER ALL OF LIFE.

item.title: CANADA DAY SPECIAL: Our Nation - Past, Present, and Future [The Liberty Lounge with Tim Tysoe]
item.description:
Liberty Lounge w/ Tim Tysoe ~ June 30, 2023
The Liberty Lounge is open once again! Host Tim Tysoe is joined by Dr. Michael Thiessen, Andrew DeBartolo, and Matthew Hallick to discuss our great nation, its history, its present struggles, and its future hope.

Episode Resources:
"Canada Should Consider Legal Solution to Fight Residential School Denialism: Report" | CTV News: https://www.ctvnews.ca/politics/canada-should-consider-legal-solution-to-fight-residential-school-denialism-report-1.6444093;
"Canada Must Combat Residential School Denialism, Report Says" | National Post: https://nationalpost.com/news/canada/canada-must-combat-residential-school-denialism-report-says;

WATCH: Race Baiting in Canada: Unpacking the Aboriginal Grievance Industry ft. James Pew | OPEN MIKE: https://rumble.com/v1rq3ma-race-baiting-in-canada-unpacking-the-aboriginal-grievance-industry-ft.-jame.html;

LISTEN: Every Child Matters. Every One. | THE GREAT EXCHANGE: 
https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/every-child-matters-every-one/id1003079702?i=1000529629255; 

DID YOU PARTICIPATE IN LCC'S NEWEST INITIATIVE, "TRUE READINGS FROM TRUE ROYALTY"?
